name: Recycled Gardens
materials: Brick(s); Plastics (Other); Stone; Wood; Yard Waste; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
You are welcome to bring donations of un potted plant material and pot it up at RG because we have lots of pots and soil on site. Please keep the roots protected during transport. We can sometimes arrange to pick up things that will fit in a regular little pickup.

Recycled Gardens doesn't just accept plants, we accept donations of pond liners, hardware cloth, tomato cages, plant stakes, decorative clay and ceramic pots and even garden art or items that can be made into garden art!
